class.name: CAT2DViewer
class.abstract: Class to display 2D Graphic Representations on the screen.

method.name: ClassId
method.abstract: Returns the class identifier for which the given object is an instance.

method.name: GetGlobal2DBoundingBox
method.abstract: Gets the rectangle zone of the representations attached to the viewer.

method.name: GetModelCoordinates
method.abstract: Gets the pixel position at which a given model point is displayed.

method.name: GetPixelCoordinates
method.abstract: Gets the point expressed in the model coordinate system lying under the given pixel position.

method.name: GetViewport
method.abstract: Gets the rectangle zone seen through the window.

method.name: ReframeOn
method.abstract: Reframes a zone of the model into the window.

method.name: SetPlane
method.abstract: Synchronizes the 3DMainViewpoint and the 2DMainViewpoint.

class.name: CAT3DSimpleSphereRep
class.abstract: Class to create the representation of a sphere.

class.name: CAT3DViewer
class.abstract: Class to display 3D Graphic Representations on the screen.

method.name: ClassId
method.abstract: Returns the class identifier for which the given object is an instance.

method.name: GetGlobalBoundingSphere
method.abstract: Gets the CAT3DBoundingSphere of the scene displayed by the CAT3DViewer.

method.name: ReframeOn
method.abstract: Modifies the Main 3D viewpoint so that the specified CAT3DBoundingSphere takes as much place as possible on the screen.

class.name: CATAddElements
class.abstract: class CATAddElements.

data.name: _ListElt
data.abstract: The list of all elements added in the set.

constructor.name: CATColorPathElementRep
constructor.abstract: Constructs a rep from a path of objects and a path of graphical representations.

constructor.name: CATColorPathElementRep
constructor.abstract: Constructs a rep from a path of objects and a path of graphical representations.

class.name: CATCsoNotification
class.abstract: class CATCsoNotification.

constructor.name: CATCsoNotification
constructor.abstract: The default constructor take an element on which we work.

method.name: GetObject
method.abstract: Return the working object included in the notification.

class.name: CATEmptyElements
class.abstract: Event that defined an remove of elements in a Set of Objects.

data.name: _ListElt
data.abstract: The list of all elements added in the SO.

class.name: CATExtIBasicVisProperties
class.abstract: Base class for CATIVisProperties Adapter.

class.name: CATExtIModelEvents
class.abstract: Class which is an Adapter to the CATIModelEvents interface.

method.name: ConnectTo
method.abstract: Connects current object to a given one.

method.name: DeconnectFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects current object from a given one.

method.name: Dispatch
method.abstract: Sends a notification.

method.name: GetDispatcher
method.abstract: Returns the dispatcher of notification.

method.name: Receive
method.abstract: Receives a notification thru the CATIModelEvents mechanism.

class.name: CATExtIVisu
class.abstract: Adapter for specialized CATIVisu interface .

method.name: BuildHighlightLook
method.abstract: Builds step by step a path of graphical representations from a path of objects for (pre)highlight purposes.

method.name: BuildRep
method.abstract: Builds the graphical representation of the object.

method.name: BuildRepPath
method.abstract: Builds step by step a path of graphical representations from a path of objects.

method.name: DecodeGraphic
method.abstract: Builds step by step a path of objects from a path of graphical representations.

method.name: GetChildrenList
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the list of children of the current object.

method.name: GiveRep
method.abstract: Returns the graphical representation of the object.

method.name: IsHighlightValid
method.abstract: Method used to test if the elements of a CATPathElement are valid for highlight.

method.name: IsRepUpToDate
method.abstract: Tests whether or not the graphical representation of the current component is uptodate.

method.name: ModifyRep
method.abstract: Modifies the geometry or the graphical attributes of the object.

method.name: SetAsmGraphicAttribute
method.abstract: Sets asm graphic attributes on the rep.

method.name: SetEdgeGraphicAttribute
method.abstract: Sets edge graphic attributes on the rep.

method.name: SetGraphicAttribut
method.abstract: Sets the main graphic attributes onto the graphical representation.

method.name: SetGraphicAttributeSet
method.abstract: Transfer some data from a CATVisPropertiesValues in a CATGraphicAttributeSet.

method.name: SetGraphicMaterial
method.abstract: Sets the material attribute onto the graphical representation.

method.name: SetLineGraphicAttribute
method.abstract: Sets line graphic attributes on the rep.

method.name: SetMeshGraphicAttribute
method.abstract: Sets mesh graphic attributes on the rep.

method.name: SetOtherGeomTypeGraphicAttribute
method.abstract: Sets other graphic attributes (different from point, edge, line, mesh and asm) on the rep.

method.name: SetPointGraphicAttribute
method.abstract: Sets point graphic attributes on the rep.

method.name: SetRepNotUpToDate
method.abstract: Sets the graphical representation of this object to an not uptodate state.

method.name: UnreferenceRep
method.abstract: Sets the reference to the graphical representation to null.

data.name: _iid
data.abstract: IID of the interface that object implements by deriving CATExtIVisu.

data.name: _rep
data.abstract: A pointer to the geometry associated to the current model.

class.name: CATGraphicPathElement
class.abstract: Class representing a CATPathElement with graphical informations.

constructor.name: CATGraphicPathElement
constructor.abstract:
Copy constructor of a CATGraphicPathElement taking a CATPathElement
in parameter.

method.name: Clone
method.abstract: Creates a new CATGraphicPathElement by dupplication of this.

method.name: FindElement
method.abstract: Finds an element in the CATGraphicPathElement.

method.name: GetInteractiveContext
method.abstract: Gets the interactive context.

method.name: SetInteractiveContext
method.abstract: Defines the interactive context.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Operator of assignment.

class.name: CATHSO
class.abstract: Class representing the set of hihglighted objects.

method.name: Empty
method.abstract: Empties all elements from the set.

method.name: EndAddElements
method.abstract: Completes the action of adding elements to the set.

method.name: EndRemoveElements
method.abstract: Completes the action of removing elements from the set.

class.name: CATModelForRep2D
class.abstract: Class for dialog help 2D objects.

method.name: SetRep
method.abstract: Associates a graphic representation.

class.name: CATModelForRep3D
class.abstract: Class for dialog help 3D objects.

method.name: SetRep
method.abstract: Associates a graphic representation.

class.name: CATNavigation2DViewer
class.abstract: Class to display 2D Graphic Representations on the screen, adding the Local Transformations.

method.name: DisplayNextViewpoint
method.abstract: Restore the Viewpoint store after the current viepoint.

method.name: DisplayPreviousViewpoint
method.abstract: Restore the Viewpoint store before the current viepoint.

method.name: SaveViewpoint
method.abstract: Store the Current MainViewpoint so that it cn be restored later.

class.name: CATNavigation3DViewer
class.abstract: Class to display 3D Graphic Representations on the screen, adding the Local Transformations.

method.name: DisplayNextViewpoint
method.abstract: Restores the Viewpoint store after the current viepoint.

method.name: DisplayPreviousViewpoint
method.abstract: Restores the Viewpoint store before the current viepoint.

method.name: SaveViewpoint
method.abstract: Stores the Current MainViewpoint so that it cn be restored later.

method.name: SetMainViewpoint
method.abstract: Changes the viewpoint that is affected by Local Transformation .

method.name: SetReferenceAxis
method.abstract: Display the reference axes or hide them.

class.name: CATPSO
class.abstract: Class representing the set of pre-hihglighted objects.

method.name: Empty
method.abstract: Empties all elements in the set.

method.name: EndAddElements
method.abstract: Completes the action of adding elements to the set.

method.name: EndRemoveElements
method.abstract: Completes the action of removing elements from the set.

class.name: CATPathElementRep
class.abstract: Class representing a path of 3D graphical representations associated to a path of objects.

constructor.name: CATPathElementRep
constructor.abstract: Constructs a rep from a path of objects and a path of graphical representations.

constructor.name: CATPathElementRep
constructor.abstract: Constructs a rep from a path of objects and a path of graphical representations.

method.name: GetElementPath
method.abstract: Returns a reference to the path of objects.

method.name: GetPathElement
method.abstract: Returns a reference to the path of objects.

method.name: IsCSOOperationRep
method.abstract: This function enables the user to know if the rep is set to be used in a highlight context.

method.name: SetCSOOperationRep
method.abstract: Enables the user to specify that the rep is used in a highlight context.

class.name: CATRemoveElements
class.abstract: Event that defined an remove of elements in a Set of Objects.

data.name: _ListElt
data.abstract: The list of all elements added in the SO.

class.name: CATRepShortHelp
class.abstract: Class to add a short message to the representation.

method.name: HideShortHelp
method.abstract: Delete the short help text.

method.name: ShowShortHelp
method.abstract: Shows a short help text.

class.name: CATSO
class.abstract: A set of objects.

method.name: AddElement
method.abstract: Adds an element to the set.

method.name: Empty
method.abstract: Remove all elements from the set.

method.name: Gather
method.abstract: Gathers an other set with this one.

method.name: GetSize
method.abstract: Returns the count of elements in the set.

method.name: IsMember
method.abstract: Checks if an element ready exists in the set.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes an element from the set.

method.name: operator []
method.abstract: Subscripting operator.

class.name: CATSelector
class.abstract: Class to select representations.

class.name: CATViewer
class.abstract: Class to display Graphic Representations on the screen.

method.name: AddRep
method.abstract: Adds a representation 2D in the main CAT2DViewpoint.

method.name: AddRep
method.abstract: Adds a representation 3D in the Main 3D Viewpoint.

method.name: AddRepFurtive
method.abstract: Adds a furtive representation in the Main CAT2DViewpoint.

method.name: AddRepFurtive
method.abstract: Adds a 3D furtive representation in the main CAT3DViewpoint.

method.name: AddViewpoint
method.abstract: Adds a new viewpoint in the Viewer's list with the highest/lowest priority.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent when something happens to the viewer.

method.name: ClassId
method.abstract: Returns the class identifier for which the given object is an instance.

method.name: DisplayNextViewpoint
method.abstract: Restores the Viewpoint store after the current viepoint.

method.name: DisplayPreviousViewpoint
method.abstract: Restores the Viewpoint store before the current viepoint.

method.name: Draw
method.abstract: Asks for generating a new "image" displayed in the Viewer's screen.

method.name: DrawElement
method.abstract: Draws a CATRepPath without redrawing the entire screen .

method.name: DrawElements
method.abstract: Draws a list of CATRepPath without redrawing the entire screen.

method.name: End2DRemoveReps
method.abstract: Updates the 2D viewpoint to take into account the removal of reps.

method.name: End2DRemoveRepsFurtive
method.abstract: Updates the 2D viewpoint to take into account the removal of reps.

method.name: EndRemoveReps
method.abstract: Updates the 3D viewpoint to take into account the removal of reps.

method.name: EndRemoveRepsFurtive
method.abstract: Updates the 3D viewpoint to take into account the removal of reps.

method.name: GetBackgroundColor
method.abstract: Retreives the background color.

method.name: GetCATColormap
method.abstract: Gets the CATColormMap.

method.name: GetContextualMenu
method.abstract: Gets the CATDlgContextualMenu displayed when you right click on the viewer.

method.name: GetDefaultBackgroundIndicator
method.abstract: Gets the default CATIndicator associated to the backGround.

method.name: GetFeedbackMode
method.abstract: Returns the feedback mode.

method.name: GetGlobalAmbientLight
method.abstract: Retreives the global ambient light color.

method.name: GetGraphicSize
method.abstract: Gets the size in pixel of the viewer.

method.name: GetLightSourceReps
method.abstract: Gets the two CAT3DLightSourceRep associated to the viewer.

method.name: GetMMInSupportUnit
method.abstract: Gets the Inverse of the size(height) of a pixel in millimeter.

method.name: GetMain2DViewpoint
method.abstract: Gets the main CAT2DViewopint.

method.name: GetMain3DViewpoint
method.abstract: Gets the main CAT3DViewopint.

method.name: GetMainViewpoint
method.abstract: Gets the main viewpoint.

method.name: GetManipulatorToActive
method.abstract: Gets the CATManipulator to activate.

method.name: GetMousePosition
method.abstract: Gets the cursor position in pixel coordinates.

method.name: GetOverlayViewpoint
method.abstract: Gets the OverlayViewpoint.

method.name: GetPickingOptions
method.abstract: Gets the options attached to this viewer for picking.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Gets the CATSupport associated to the CATViewer.

method.name: IsBackgroundGraduated
method.abstract: Gets whether or not the background is graduated.

method.name: IsFullScreen
method.abstract: Gets whether or not the Viewer is in fullScreen.

method.name: IsNextViewpoint
method.abstract: Gets wether or not there is a viewpoint store after the current one.

method.name: IsPreviousViewpoint
method.abstract: Gets wether or not there is a viewpoint store before the current one.

method.name: Pick
method.abstract: Generates a CATPickPathList corresponding to all representations laying under the given position.

method.name: Pick
method.abstract: Generates a CATPickPathList corresponding to all representations laying under the given position.

method.name: Reframe
method.abstract: Changes the Main Viewpoint to have all the repreentations visible on screen.

method.name: RemoveManipulatorToActive
method.abstract: Removes the CATManipulator to be activated.

method.name: RemoveRep
method.abstract: Removes a representation 2D from the main CAT2DViewpoint.

method.name: RemoveRep
method.abstract: Removes a representation 3D from the main CAT3DViewpoint.

method.name: RemoveRepFurtive
method.abstract: Removes a 2D furtive representation from Main 2D Viewpoint .

method.name: RemoveRepFurtive
method.abstract: Removes a 3D furtive representation from main 3D Viewpoint.

method.name: RemoveReps
method.abstract: Removes a representation 2D from the main CAT2DViewpoint.

method.name: RemoveReps
method.abstract: Removes a representation 3D from the Main CAT3DViewpoint to be visualized.

method.name: RemoveRepsFurtive
method.abstract: Removes a furtive representation from the Main 2D Viewpoint.

method.name: RemoveRepsFurtive
method.abstract: Removes a furtive representation from the main 3D Viewpoint.

method.name: RemoveViewpoint
method.abstract: Removes the viewpoint from the viewer's list.

method.name: Resize
method.abstract: Resize the viewer.

method.name: SaveViewpoint
method.abstract: Stores the Current MainViewpoint so that it can be restored later.

method.name: SetBackgroundColor
method.abstract: Sets the background color.

method.name: SetCursor
method.abstract: Sets the cursor displayed when the mouse is over the viewer.

method.name: SetFeedbackMode
method.abstract: Sets the feedback mode.

method.name: SetFullScreen
method.abstract: Sets the viewer's FullScreen state.

method.name: SetGlobalAmbientLight
method.abstract: Sets the global ambient light color.

method.name: SetGraduatedBackground
method.abstract: Sets whether or not the background is graduated.

method.name: SetIndicator
method.abstract: Sets the current indicator.

method.name: SetLightSourceReps
method.abstract: Sets the two CAT3DLightSourceRep associated to the viewer.

method.name: SetMainViewpoint
method.abstract: Sets the main viewpoint of the viewer.

method.name: SetManipulatorToActive
method.abstract: Sets the CATManipulator to activate on next mouse interaction.

method.name: SetViewMode
method.abstract: Sets the viewmode for viewer enclosed in the current CATSupport.

method.name: UndrawElement
method.abstract: Undraws a CATRepPath if it is Furtive .

method.name: UndrawElements
method.abstract: Undraws a list of CATRepPath if they are Furtive .

method.name: ViewMode
method.abstract: Returns whether or not the given mode is active.

class.name: CATVisManager
class.abstract: Class enabling the MVC.

method.name: AttachHSOTo
method.abstract: Tells to VisuManager that we want to connect a Hso to a peculiar viewpoint.

method.name: AttachPSOTo
method.abstract: Tells to VisuManager that we want to connect a Pso to a peculiar viewpoint.

method.name: AttachTo
method.abstract: Creates a new cell of visualization.

method.name: AttachTo
method.abstract: Creates a new cell of visualization.

method.name: BuildHighlightLook
method.abstract: Gives the rep path equivalent to the model path when highlight is concerned.

method.name: BuildRep
method.abstract: Creates the graphical representation of one object.

method.name: BuildRepPath
method.abstract: Gives the rep path equivalent to the model path.

method.name: Commit
method.abstract: Requests the processing of all the events hold by the VisuManager that have not been processed yet.

method.name: Commit
method.abstract: Requests the processing of the input event.

method.name: DecodeGraphic
method.abstract: Gives the model path equivalent to the rep path.

method.name: DetachFrom
method.abstract: Detaches all tuples ( path / viewpoint / list of visualization interfaces ) corresponding to a given viewpoint.

method.name: DetachFrom
method.abstract: Detaches all tuples ( path / viewpoint / list of visualization interfaces ) corresponding to a given path and a given viewpoint.

method.name: DetachFrom
method.abstract: Detaches a tuple ( path / viewpoint / list of visualization interfaces ).

method.name: DetachHSOFrom
method.abstract: Tells to VisuManager that we want to detach the Hso from a peculiar viewpoint.

method.name: DetachPSOFrom
method.abstract: Tells to VisuManager that we want to detach the Pso from a peculiar viewpoint.

method.name: DisconnectFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects all the cells corresponding to tuples (path / viewpoint/ list of visualization interfaces) having a given viewpoint.

method.name: DisconnectFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects all the cells corresponding to tuples (path / viewpoint/ list of visualization interfaces) having a given path and a given viewpoint.

method.name: DisconnectFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects all the cells corresponding to tuples (path / viewpoint/ list of visualization interfaces) having a given path and a given viewpoint.

method.name: DisconnectHSOFrom
method.abstract: Disables the highligth of a viewpoint.

method.name: DisconnectHSOFrom
method.abstract: Disables the highligth for a model.

method.name: DisconnectPSOFrom
method.abstract: Disablea the pre-highligth of a viewpoint.

method.name: DisconnectPSOFrom
method.abstract: Disablea the pre-highligth for a model.

method.name: DisconnectVisuFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects the visualization of a tree of reps without destroying it.

method.name: DisconnectVisuFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects the visualization of a tree of reps without destroying it.

method.name: DisconnectVisuFrom
method.abstract: Disconnects the visualization of a tree of reps without destroying it.

method.name: Draw
method.abstract: Forces the given viewpoint to be redrawn.

method.name: DuplicateViewpoint
method.abstract: Duplicates an existing attachment.

method.name: EmptyHSO
method.abstract: Empties manually the HSO.

method.name: EmptyPSO
method.abstract: Empties manually the PSO.

method.name: FindNextRep
method.abstract: Finds the next representation from a model path ( this is used for BuildHighlightLook an BuildRepPath ).

method.name: GeneratePathElementFromPickPath
method.abstract: Gives the model path equivalent to the pick path.

method.name: GenerateRepPathFromPathElement
method.abstract: Gives the rep path equivalent to the model path.

method.name: GetVisManager
method.abstract: Gets The VisuManager.

method.name: IsConnectedTo
method.abstract: Returns whether or not a cell is connected .

method.name: ReconnectHSOTo
method.abstract: Enables the highligth in a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectHSOTo
method.abstract: Enables a model entry to be highligthed in a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectPSOTo
method.abstract: Enablea the pre-highligth in a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectPSOTo
method.abstract: Enables a model entry to be pre-highligthed in a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectTo
method.abstract: Reconnects to all the cells corresponding to tuples (path / viewpoint/ list of visualization interfaces) having a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectTo
method.abstract: Reconnects to all the cells corresponding to tuples (path / viewpoint/ list of visualization interfaces) having a given path and a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectTo
method.abstract: Reconnects all the cells corresponding to tuples (path / viewpoint/ list of visualization interfaces) having a given path and a given viewpoint.

method.name: ReconnectVisuTo
method.abstract: Reconnects the visualization of a tree without rebuilding it.

method.name: ReconnectVisuTo
method.abstract: Reconnects the visualization of a tree without rebuilding it.

method.name: ReconnectVisuTo
method.abstract: Reconnects the visualization of a tree without rebuilding it.

method.name: SetFurtiveMode
method.abstract: Sets in furtive mode or not a given model entry for a viewpoint.

method.name: SetLocalGraphicAttributs
method.abstract: Forces a model to work only with its locals graphic attributs not taking into account its fathers'.

method.name: SetLocalMatrix
method.abstract: Forces a model to work only with its local matrix and to not taking into account its fathers' matrix.

method.name: SetSelector
method.abstract: Sets Selector on the tuple ( path / viewpoint / list of visualization interfaces ).

method.name: SomethingHappensInSO
method.abstract: (Pre)Highlights pathes of objects hold in the input notification.

method.name: UnreferenceRep
method.abstract: Removes the link between the extension of visualization of a model and this model.

class.name: CATVisViewerFeedbackEvent
class.abstract: Class notification for CATViewer interactions.

method.name: GetContext
method.abstract: Retrieves the context that gave birth to the event.

method.name: GetElementsUnder
method.abstract: Retrieves elements under the mouse.

method.name: GetIntersection
method.abstract: Retrieves the intersection point between the mouse pointer and the underlying geometry.

method.name: GetMousePosition
method.abstract: Retrieves the mouse pointer position in screen coordinates.

method.name: GetViewer
method.abstract: Retrieves the viewer that triggered the event.

class.name: CATXSO
class.abstract: Base class of set of objects.

method.name: AddElement
method.abstract: Adds just one element to the set.

method.name: AddElements
method.abstract: Adds one element in the set, among a list of several elements.

method.name: EndAddElements
method.abstract: Completes the action of adding elements to the set.

method.name: EndRemoveElements
method.abstract: Completes the action of removing elements from the set.

method.name: GetCATAddElements
method.abstract: Returns the name of the notification which is sent when elements are added to the set.

method.name: GetCATEmptyElements
method.abstract: Returns the name of the notification which is sent when it is empty.

method.name: GetCATRemoveElements
method.abstract: Returns the name of the notification which is sent when elements are removed from the set.

method.name: GetSize
method.abstract: Returns the count of elements in the set.

method.name: IsMember
method.abstract: Checks if an element is already in the set.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes just one element from the set.

method.name: RemoveElements
method.abstract: Removes one element in the set, among a list of several elements.

method.name: operator []
method.abstract: Subscripting operator.

enum.name: CATGenerativeAttribute
enum.abstract: Attribute allowing to generate a path.

function.name: CATVisGetCurvedPipeGPFromRep
function.abstract: Get the GraphicPrimitive from a CAT3DCurvedPipeRep.

function.name: CATVisGetCylinderGPFromRep
function.abstract: Get the GraphicPrimitive from a CAT3DCylinderRep.

function.name: sCATGetMMThicknessFromViewer
function.abstract: Gets the millimeter width of a given line thickness.

function.name: sCATGetPixelThicknessFromViewer
function.abstract: Gets the pixel width of a given line thickness.

function.name: sCATVisForceDynamicMode
function.abstract: Force dyanmic mode's activation on a CATViewer.

class.name: CATISelectShow
class.abstract: Interface for managing the hide/show command.

method.name: GetElementForHideShow
method.abstract: Selects the object to really put in show/noshow from the user selection.

method.name: SelectShowPostProcess
method.abstract: Post-processes a pathelement after an element has been put in Show or No Show.

class.name: CATIVisuFilter
class.abstract: Interface for visibility in layer filter.

method.name: IsVisible
method.abstract: Returns the visibility state of an object or a layer in the current layer filter.
